name: Rotation (itch) (DennisByDEN.)
description:
Rotate the map around to collect all the keys and then reach the center. 

Use physics to your advantage. Race against time to complete challenging levels.

Can you reach every part of the map collecting all of the keys scattered around and get to the center of the map just by rotating the map clockwise or counterclockwise?

Can you do it in under 60 seconds? 

Controls:

  • A/D to rotate the map
  • Esc to quit

If you love this game look up my other games on itch.io.

Comment your experience and feel free to contact me via email (dennisbydengames@gmail.com)!

Follow my work and see you in my next projects and games!!!
